parameter.name: cust_id
parameter.query: SELECT DISTINCT aropen.aropen_cust_id, custinfo.cust_number || '-' || custinfo.cust_name FROM aropen JOIN custinfo ON aropen.aropen_cust_id = custinfo.cust_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT aropen_1.aropen_id, sum(aropenalloc.aropenalloc_amount) AS alloc_amount FROM aropen aropen_1 JOIN aropenalloc ON aropenalloc.aropenalloc_aropen_id = aropen_1.aropen_id WHERE NOT (aropenalloc.aropenalloc_doc_id IN ( SELECT COALESCE(arapply.arapply_ref_id, 0) AS "coalesce" FROM arapply)) GROUP BY aropen_1.aropen_id) alloc ON alloc.aropen_id = aropen.aropen_id WHERE aropen.aropen_doctype IN ('C','I') AND aropen.aropen_applyto != aropen.aropen_docnumber --AND aropen_cust_id = 14671 AND _report.getschoolyear(aropen_docdate) = _report.getschoolyear(current_date)

querysource.name: detail
querysource.sql: SELECT pd_statement_doc_number, pd_statement_cust_number, pd_statement_cust_name, pd_statement_doc_date, pd_statement_doc_type, pd_statement_amount, pd_statement_registered, pd_statement_description FROM _report.pd_statement_balance (<? value("cust_id") ?>,<? value("statement_date") ?>) ORDER BY pd_statement_doc_date;

querysource.name: head
querysource.sql: SELECT cust_name, cust_address1, cust_address2, cust_address3, (cust_city || ' ' || cust_state || ' ' || cust_zipcode) AS citystatezip, formatDate(COALESCE(<? value("asofdate") ?>, current_date)) AS asofdate FROM cust WHERE (cust_id = <? value("cust_id") ?>);

querysource.name: Currency
querysource.sql: SELECT currconcat(cust_curr_id) AS currAbbr FROM cust WHERE (cust_id=<? value("cust_id") ?>)

querysource.name: remitto
querysource.sql: select remitto_name, formatAddr(remitto_address1, remitto_address2, remitto_address3, remitto_citystatezip, remitto_phone) AS remitto_adr from remitto
